doc.field: Series I: New York Teacher Photograph Files

Series I: New York TeacherPhotograph Files is comprised of photograph files from the New York Teacher, NYSUT's official newspaper, dating from 1905 to 1987. While the majority of the images focus on the UFT and New York City schools, there are also a large number of images relating to NYSUT and upstate New York teacher associations that reflect this close association, most of which date from the 1970s and early 1980s. Photographs that pre-date the creation of the New York Teacher may have come from the files of the UFT's earlier, pre-NYSUT publication, United Teacher, and before that, the files of New York Teacher News, published by the Teachers' Union.

New York Teacher, NYSUT's official newspaper, was established in September 1972, and published in co-terminous New York City and New York State editions. The New York City edition was published for UFT members, the New York State edition for NYSUT teacher associations and locals. The two editions appear to have been closely allied, sharing office space as well as some staff and resources (presumably including photographs).
Series I: New York Teacher Photograph Files
